name: Untrapped
description:
Untrapped is a top-down rhythm-based shooter where you fight your way through the streets of the city and try to stay on beat for the longest streak.

The game will feature a unique story about a character who is rooted in street culture and has to tap into the music and wisdom of his people to find his way out of the violence.

In the game, you can utilize special abilities to slow down or speed up the music to gain an advantage.

The game features and celebrates a mix of hip hop, jazz and afrobeat music.
